- Human–atmosphere–vegetation interactions

# News
******  

- [New paper](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.foreco.2020.118410){target="_blank"} in *Forest Ecology and Management* links forest structural development to a general 'motif' of plant diversity --- useful for a silviculture that balances diversity with a landscape spectrum of structural stages?  

<!-- - Highlighted contributor for the [USFS Research Participation Program](https://orise.orau.gov/usfs/profiles/smith.html){target="_blank"}.   -->

- Featured as [Early Career Researcher](https://journalofbiogeographynews.org/2020/02/14/ecr-feature-rob-smith/){target="_blank"} at *Journal of Biogeography*'s news site... if you need a laugh.  

- Our [paper](https://doi.org/10.1111/jbi.13719){target="_blank"} on climate vulnerability is published in *Journal of Biogeography*. Source code [here](https://github.com/phytomosaic/vuln){target="_blank"} and equations [here](./images/vuln_equations.pdf).  

- Joined with the [Stanton lab](https://cbs.umn.edu/contacts/daniel-stanton){target="_blank"} and the [Market Science](https://cbs.umn.edu/market-science/about){target="_blank"} outreach team to share the wonders of lichens with all ages at the Minnesota State Fair.  

- Continued our 6th year of long-term lichen monitoring at the [SPRUCE](https://mnspruce.ornl.gov){target="_blank"} whole-ecosystem warming experiment.  

- [Our paper](https://doi.org/10.1002/ajb2.1022){target="_blank"} sharing initial SPRUCE findings is now [highlighted](https://doi.org/10.1002/ajb2.1036){target="_blank"} in *American Journal of Botany*.  

- New [ELON](https://elonpreview.weebly.com/){target="_blank"} stations continue to be installed throughout the western U.S.
